sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Biomonitoring Feasibility Study Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Biomonitoring Feasibility Study Act.

sections.heading: Study report.  Two years after the effective date of this Act, UIC shall release a draft report for public review and comment and for review by the Panel
sections.text: The draft report shall contain the findings of the Study and shall include in the report recommended activities and estimated costs of establish
